body: These list the average scores for a creature of this size. Your specific monster's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution might vary greatly from these numbers, but if they do, you should pay close attention to how these variances affect its other statistics.
url: pfsrd://Bestiary/Rules/Monster Creation/Building the Monster/Step 4 Size/Base Str/Base Dex/Base Con
name: Base Str, Base Dex, Base Con
